name: TSATechSmartControl
0:
”Alexa, turn on kitchen”
”Alexa, set bedroom to fifty percent”
”Alexa, increase thermostat by 2 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: TSA Tech Smart Control is a skill that allows you to control your smart devices with your voice. You can control lights, switches, thermostats, and more with your voice. To get started, enable the skill and link your TSA Tech Smart Home account.
